Profiler.description:
Measure rendering performance of a React tree programmatically.

通过编程方式测量 React 树的渲染性能。

body: function onRender(id, phase, actualDuration, baseDuration, startTime, commitTime) {
console.log("🚀 ~ onRender ~ id:%o, phase:%o, actualDuration:%o, baseDuration:%o, startTime:%o, commitTime:%o", id, phase, actualDuration, baseDuration, startTime, commitTime);
